cometime = #{cometime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
maxscore = #{maxscore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
minscore = #{minscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
